description.english: At no point were any weapons purchased specifically for the purposes of velociraptor control. No large standardised shipments for the guard retinue or anything like that. All the same, weapons started to appear on the island.
It turns out doing the same thing repeatedly will result in different results. It was still kind of insane though.
All employees should attend the Small Firearms Starter Training and Forcefield Refresher Training sessions
It was most certainly that fellow which I don't like, your honour. The Defence rests. Can I get some lunch in here please?
Jenny was born in Lyon, France, so it makes perfect grammatical sense to accuse her like this. You have my permission to update the wiki with this information, but nothing else.
Helen doesn't actually want a new job. She's very comfortable in her current role and she likes the freedom and exotic locale. She just likes to know she has options.
Tony has killed one person on the island in the past twenty four hours. The job was actually pretty sloppy and not an indicator of his usual professionalism. Luckily...

Adrian planned to propose to his girlfriend on the pier where they first met. The proposal went well. The freak steamroller accident immediately afterwards not so much. Luckily there aren't any labour laws regarding ghosts, and so he was able to get back to work the next day.

displayName.english: I PRESENT RANDOM EVIDENCE, YOUR HONOUR

description.english: Taking random actions in life is what led me to this point in my life, and so it makes sense that i should get some kind of merit for continuing this status quo. It is entirely possible that my life has no meaning.

Let's not fool ourselves. You forced yourself to get this achievement. I'm glad you like the game enough to go around 100%ing it. Could i have some money please? You look like the type who would cave to such requests.

The raptors followed Philip towards the gardens. He doubted the Admin building's forcefield. He hoped his years of playing paintball would finally pay off. The last thing he saw was the forcefield wrapping around the building, and a raptor bouncing off it like a paintball ricocheting off a helmet. He should have never gone into accounting.
I'm guessing you got this one after a few replays. I think at the start i was generally planning to have a larger garden maze section, but this is what we ended up with.

displayName.english: WITH THE BACK DOOR LEFT OPEN

description.english: Paul and Adrian started on the same day. Adrian showed initiative, asking many questions to get them both familiar with the new job. Paul was grateful and decided from now on they would be friends. Then Adrian slipped on some water. Todd passed by and started to laugh. Paul then decided copying the boss would be the best way to demonstrate his friendship.
This one took effort on your part. Stupid effort. But effort none the less. Well done. Truly an achievement.

displayName.english: WE GOT TO IT. IT DIDN'T MATTER.

description.english: Tony owns the helicopter. He bought it at a helicopter auction. His target had been a French Ambassador with illegal ties to the Swiss Cheese industry. In order to start the acquaintance that would lead to contact Tony dramatically outbid the target. After the mission was successful, he simply kept it.

Naked Raptor was never shunned by its peers. Wizard Raptor only got the hat today. Reception Raptor was able to beat Adrian's high score on Tetris within a few minutes. Scaraptor only received his burns in the last hour. All fed well today.

displayName.english: ENDING CATERS TO EXACTLY FOUR PEOPLE

description.english: Paul once bumped into the Cuban Ambassador in the car park. With the intent of showing him to Todd's office, the two trekked on a four hour expedition through the gardens. The Ambassador was found playing on a slide suffering from severe heatstroke. That is when the rule was established.

Scaraptor earned her nicknamed by being the first escape incident the park incurred. One of three raptors imported, her cage broke whilst being transported to the pen, where she received a scar on the inside of her hind leg. She also left multiple scars on Transport Officer Martina Higg's chest, body and neck, but the officer was good enough not to hold a grudge.

Lilly was never employed by the Park, even though her skills were vital to its operations. Todd was unaware she was even there, not that he handled employment. He was very aware of her mother. Had he not got a new boat, he might have realised. Not that it matters to any of them now. Except Lilly. It matters to her a lot.

Despite the name, the Raptorman Empire got into creating dinosaurs late. Their initial focus was on utilising extracted RNA for medical research purposes. When that didn't work out they opted for chemical warfare. When they were repeatedly told it was illegal they opted for entertainment purposes. The rest failed to be history.

A helicopter was found today off the Everglades coastline. Police were unsure how long it had been there, and if it had crashed or been abandoned. Local resident Frederick Mann found the craft after hearing gunshots and growling, and believed the events to be the work of Cuban spies. The president was unavailable for comment, but that's expected for a story like this.

displayName.english: THE BIT AT THE END THAT WASN'T WORTH IT

description.english: This ending takes no inspiration from any other sources. It is a wholly original work generated entirely within my own brain. I never even heard of some gun cat man with an amazing moustache. Shut up. Leave me alone.

displayName.english: DO YOU WANT KNOW HOW I NOT GET THESE SCARS?

description.english: Get others eaten by Scaraptor without scarring her face.

displayName.english: YOU ATTEMPTED TO ESCAPE... AND SUCCEEDED!

description.english: Todd never wanted the Admin building to have a forcefield system. The argument that staff should have some defense should the worst occur fell on ears that refused to listen and would sing LA LA LA if anyone tried. He changed his mind once he saw the big office left behind by the island's previous owners.
